action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a street market scene with a woman in a purple shirt and apron standing behind a table filled with various vegetables. There are bunches of bananas hanging from the ceiling in the background. Another woman in a purple jacket is walking past the table, carrying a brown purse. The market appears to be outdoors, with a tiled wall and a cardboard box on the ground.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a close-up of a brown horse with a white blaze on its face, wearing a red halter with a silver buckle. The horse is standing on a dirt ground with some straw scattered around. The horse is leaning its head over a metal fence, and a light brown dog is on the other side of the fence, sniffing the horse's nose. The dog appears to be a large breed with a short coat. The background is mostly dirt with some sparse grass
